casebody.data:
Michael ANDERSON, Appellant,
v.
The STATE of Florida, Appellee. No. 3D18-2096 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Third District. Opinion filed December 5, 2018 Michael Anderson, in proper person. Pamela Jo Bondi, Attorney General, for appellee. Before SALTER, LUCK and LINDSEY, JJ. PER CURIAM.

Affirmed.
